name: Ambient® Strobe Light Sculptor
description:
What it is:
An innovative, dual-ended sculptor that provides precise placement of Ambient® Strobe Lighting Powder to the high points of the face, for a refined, natural highlight.

What it does:
Designed to be used with the Ambient Strobe Lighting Powders, the dual-ended sculptor has an angled side to fit perfectly on the high points of face for effortless application. It features a velvety-soft flocked side to soften and blend for the most natural-looking, light and dimension with a smooth finish. Featuring a dense texture, it picks up the perfect amount of highlighting powder to achieve a natural strobing effect. Composed of high-grade, anti-microbial material, it can be used wet for more intense highlighting.

What else you need to know:
Hourglass products are 100 percent cruelty-free.
usage:
Suggested Usage:
-Sweep angled side of Sculptor over Ambient® Strobe Lighting Powder and apply to high points of the face: the tops of the cheeks, bridge of the nose, browbones, and cupid’s bow.
-It can be used wet or dry.
-To use wet, dampen the angled side. Soften and blend using the flocked side.

name: Brow Shaper Pencil - Waterproof
color: 03 Rich Chestnut, 12 Granite, 02 Nutmeg Brown, 01 Blonde
description:

usage:

-Use the point to define and shape the contour of your brows.
-Use the wide part to fill in your brows using light movements from the inside corner to the outside edge.
-Blend with the spoolie brush for a natural finish.

name: Mini Hydration Shampoo
description:
What it is: A gentle, moisturizing hydration shampoo that softly lathers to cleanse your hair and scalp, removing buildup and dirt without stripping away moisture.

Hair Type: Wavy, Curly, and Coily

Hair Concerns:
- Curl-Enhancing
- Color Safe

Key Benefits:
- Moisturizing formula for curls, coils, and tight textures
- Cleanses your hair and scalp to remove buildup and dirt without stripping away moisture
- Contains aloe vera leaf juice, coconut oil, and honey for healthy and hydrated hair

Highlighted Ingredients:
- Aloe Leaf Juice
- Biotin
- Jojoba Oil

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Boosted with oils, our creamy, gentle Hydration Shampoo cleanses your curls, coils, and scalp, removing buildup and dirt without stripping away moisture. We skipped harsh surfactants like SLS or SLES. Bathe curls in a moisture-rich formula with ingredients like aloe vera leaf juice and coconut oil.

Fragrance Description: Tracee picked this to smell clean and not overpowering with an exotic floral mélange of jasmine, bergamot, and sweet sandalwood.
usage:
Suggested Usage:
-Massage vigorously into scalp and wet hair.
-Add more water as needed to work product through the hair.
-Rinse thoroughly.
-Wash a second time as desired.
-Follow with your preferred Pattern by Tracee Ellis Ross conditioner (sold separately).
-Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water.

name: Transition Mask
description:
What it is: A nutrient-dense mask that prevents breakage and maintains moisture balance—for hair transitioning away from chemical treatments or protective styles.

Hair Type: Wavy, Curly, and Coily

Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick

Hair Concerns:
- Curl-Enhancing
- Dryness
- Damage/ Split Ends

Key Benefits:
- Prevents breakage and fights hair fall
- Maintains moisture balance
- Nourishes hair in transition from protective styles or chemical treatments

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Infused with white tea to fight hair fall and manuka honey to minimize breakage and maintain moisture balance, this nutrient-dense mask is perfect for hair transitioning out of protective styles or chemical treatments. It nourishes where your natural and relaxed strands kiss.
usage:
Suggested Usage:
When transitioning out of protective styles:
-Apply generously to dry hair from ends to roots.
-Leave on for 10 to 15 minutes.
-Rinse.
-Follow up with Hydration Shampoo and Heavy or Intensive Conditioner (each sold separately).

When transitioning from relaxed to natural hair:
-After shampooing, section hair and apply from ends to roots.
-Leave on for 5 to 10 minutes.
-Rinse.
-Condition with Heavy or Intensive Conditioner.

name: Mini GRAVITYMUD™ Firming Treatment
description:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry

What it is:
A mud-based, peel-off face mask designed to tighten the appearance of skin.

Solutions for:
- Loss of firmness and elasticity

If you want to know more…
The GRAVITYMUD™ Firming Treatment is an innovative face mask that changes color from white to a brilliant chrome. The included mask application brush delivers an even coat to the face, which peels off the skin to visibly tighten and lift for a youthful-looking complexion. The skin’s contours are given a defined and radiant look.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
GRAVITYMUD is now offered in a 50 g jar—which is 25 percent more for the same price.

Research results:
In a consumer study on 151 people, with 2 times per week usage:
- 92% agreed skin felt firmer
- 91% said skin looked tighter and toned
usage:
Suggested Usage:
-Apply a generous, even layer to clean skin with fingers or a brush, avoiding the eyebrows and hairline.
-Leave on and relax for 20 to 30 minutes.
-The treatment will change color from white to chrome as it dries.
-Once it’s completely dried, gently peel off from the edges of the face.
-Rinse off any excess with warm water.
-Use twice a week for best results.
-As a pro tip, use the mask as a pre-makeup treatment for visibly firm and toned skin.

Precautions:
-Avoid the eye area.

-Tip: A little goes a long way. Use pea-sized amount on hands and larger amount on body and drier areas like elbows, knees, and feet.

Please note that the whipped texture of Beauty Butter will melt in high heat or direct sunlight. Since these products are unrefined and filler-free, the consistency can be affected but not the quality. If your Butter is melted to liquid during shipping or while in your home, place in the fridge until it firms up. It will still function and smell as it should.
